topic.title: Elected US President Donald Trump criticised the Jewish controlled Federal Reserve corrupt scamming practices against the US people and  provoked with it the outrage of the Jewish centralbanksters. The Federal Reserve is the holly cow of the Jews and brings more profit than the Holoscam. The Jewish controlled US Federal Reserve issued in the last 8 years over 4000 billions of USD without any backing which landed under various  bankster jargon names in Jewish pocket. The Rotschields bought during this time more gold than all nations of the world. The Jewish Anti-Defamation League have vehemently protested against Trump's antisemitism.
